quote: Yer a wizard Harry
author: Rubeus Hagrid

quote: I hope you're pleased with yourselves. We could all have been killed — or worse, expelled. Now if you don't mind, I'm going to bed
author: Hermione Granger

quote: It does not do well to dwell on dreams and forget to live.
author: Albus Dumbledore

quote: To the well-organized mind, death is but the next great adventure.
author: Albus Dumbledore

quote: You're a little scary sometimes, you know that? Brilliant... but scary.
author: Ron Weasley

quote: It takes a great deal of bravery to stand up to our enemies, but just as much to stand up to our friends.
author: Albus Dumbledore

quote: The truth. It is a beautiful and terrible thing, and should therefore be treated with great caution.
author: Albus Dumbledore

quote: Ah, music. A magic beyond all we do here!
author: Albus Dumbledore

quote: Fear of a name only increases fear of the thing itself.
author: Hermione Granger

quote: I’ll be in my bedroom, making no noise and pretending I’m not there.
author: Harry Potter

quote: Hearing voices no one else can hear isn’t a good sign, even in the wizarding world.
author: Ron Weasley

quote: Fawkes is a phoenix, Harry. Phoenixes burst into flame when it is time for them to die and are reborn from the ashes.
author: Albus Dumbledore

quote: I solemnly swear I am up to no good.
author: Harry Potter

quote: Happiness can be found, even in the darkest of times, if one only remembers to turn on the light.
author: Albus Dumbledore

quote: Don’t let the muggles get you down.
author: Ron Weasley

quote: I want to commit the murder I was imprisoned for.
author: Sirius Black

quote: Are you insane? Of course I want to leave the Dursleys! Have you got a house? When can I move in?
author: Harry Potter

quote: Why, dear boy, we don’t send wizards to Azkaban just for blowing up their aunts.
author: Cornelius Fudge

quote: You think the dead we loved truly ever leave us? You think that we don’t recall them more clearly in times of great trouble?
author: Albus Dumbledore

quote: If you want to know what a man’s like, take a good look at how he treats his inferiors, not his equals
author: Sirius Black

quote: It matters not what someone is born, but what they grow to be.
author: Albus Dumbledore

quote: Just because it’s taken you three years to notice, Ron, doesn’t mean no one else has spotted I’m a girl!
author: Hermione Granger

quote: I think I'll just go down and have some pudding and wait for it all to turn up — it always does in the end.
author: Luna Lovegood

quote: Just because you have the emotional range of a teaspoon doesn't mean we all have.
author: Hermione Granger

quote: You can laugh, but people used to believe there were no such things as the Blibbering Humdinger or the Crumple-Horned Snorkack!
author: Luna Lovegood

quote: I mean, it's sort of exciting, isn't it, breaking the rules?
author: Hermione Granger

quote: Wit beyond measure is man’s greatest treasure.
author: Luna Lovegood

quote: The thing about growing up with Fred and George is that you sort of start thinking anything's possible if you've got enough nerve.
author: Ginny Weasley

quote: It is the quality of one’s convictions that determines success, not the number of followers.
author: Remus Lupin

quote: I’m going to keep going until I succeed—or I die. Don’t think I don’t know how this might end. I’ve known it for years.
author: Harry Potter

quote: I've always wanted to use that spell.
author: Minerva McGonagall

quote: It does not do to dwell on dreams and forget to live.
author: Albus Dumbledore

quote: Fear of a name increases fear of the thing itself
author: Hermione Granger
